EmailTemplate.textOnly: Steve, The reason for reaching out to you is to provide you with insight into the best practices that biotech companies are leveraging to engage with independent contractors. I am also writing Lynn Cavalier and Bob Reffner at Firstenergy to provide this information. Below you can read a brief case study that illustrates how these best practices go beyond just mitigating 1099 risk to actually benefiting your bottom line. · The Business Need · Biotech company engaged with expert contract workers and former employees as 1099s to assist with important projects. · Many independent professionals are high-end contract workers such as scientists, clinical researchers, analysts, developers, marketing specialists, etc. · The Big Problem · Got audited by the state of Massachusetts for 1099s. · General Counsel realized that eliminating 1099s going forward would cause too much business disruption and a loss of needed external expertise. · High-end professional contract workers did not want to work for a staffing or payrolling company. · The Solution · General Council learned from a peer that MBO Partners specializes in IC engagements and has a solution specifically built to support how higher-end ICs prefer to work. · After due diligence, selected MBO as their IC engagement specialist. · The Result · Professional contract workers willingly engage through one of MBO’s tax-compliant solutions. · MBO indemnifies for tax risk so that it is fully mitigated. · The Icing on the Cake · Established a virtual bench of just-in-time, compliant contractors for important projects. · Enhanced their visibility into spend. · Reduced their administrative burden. · Mitigated their workers’ comp and related risks by ensuring ICs have proper business insurance. · Don’t have to pay exorbitant staffing/payrolling fees. MBO currently helps Biogen Idec, Pfizer and Merck. What I am proposing to you today is to schedule a time to talk so that I can educate you about how this all works. What do you think? Thanks for sharing your time and thoughts.
